column1: #Text=Joo Dee says : " Is n't it nice ?
#Text=Ca n't we see the Earth King any sooner ?
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world !
#Text=But he will see you as soon as time permits .
#Text=" Aang says : " If we 're going to be here for a month , we should spend our time looking for Appa .
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " I 'd like to escort you anywhere you 'd like to go .
#Text=" Toph says : " We do n't need a babysitter .
